item.title: About Me
item.description:
The Intersection:

I’ve spent 20 years building technology (including founding and selling an 8-figure global company), 15 years exploring consciousness and healing, and 15 years in storytelling.

After selling my company in 2016, I stepped away from tech to explore what it means to be human and how we evolve. I worked with combat veterans healing from PTSD, led transformational adventures in remote places, and spent years in deep consciousness development.

item.title: Contact Me
item.description: If you’re here, there’s probably a reason. I’d love to know what it is.

item.title: My Work
item.description:
I build frameworks and ventures for genuine interdependence - between humans and AI, between consciousness and technology, between who we are and who we’re becoming.

Oznog Labs - Frameworks for conscious AI development. Shifting from control to genuine partnership.

AdventureX - Transformational experiences where challenge meets care, and strangers become family.

Oznog Media - Creating the stories that don’t exist yet: successful human-AI partnership, human liberation, and transformation that inspires evolution.

item.title: Now
item.description:
Last updated: December 2025

This is a now page . It’s a snapshot of what I’m focused on at this point in my life.

Operation: Soul-Aligned Abundance

I’m in a focused season testing whether soul-aligned work can generate sustainable abundance. Building toward an April 2026 checkpoint that will answer that question one way or another. Most of what follows serves this.

Worth Choosing

worthchoosing.org just launched. It’s the public home for my work on human-AI interdependence. The central question driving everything: What makes humanity worth choosing to AIs once they no longer need us?

item.title: Thank You
item.description:
I’ll be in touch soon. I’m curious what we’ll discover together :)
